instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-4924-a no fan spin
threads.message:
Hello, 
the first problem of this board was no green light (missing PP3V42_G3H) 
I solved this issue by fixing burned R7080 (corrosion).
So now I have all power rails ON on the board and 590mA on power supply but still no fan.
I have PP5V_S0 ON but the issue is that I have 0 V to the PWM from SMC to control fan speed.
So I booted the board in SMC bypass mode and now I have a fan speed with max speed which is normal.
What can be the issue? why the board seems to boot normaly without fan spin ?

thx,
Vincent

threads.title: 820-4924-a no fan spin
threads.message: As usual on 4924 the fan won't spin until CPU reaches ~80°C.

threads.title: 820-4924-a no fan spin
threads.message:
[QUOTE="piernov, post: 64621, member: 1057"]
As usual on 4924 the fan won't spin until CPU reaches ~80°C.
[/QUOTE]
Thanks your right
